Exercicio_1a

a.) C1,6 (1010(2)) = X(2) 
1010(2) = 0 001010 = 010100(2)   

b.) C1,8 (1101(2)) = X(2) 
1101(2) = 0 00001101 = 00011010(2)

c.) C2,6 (101001(2)) = X(2) 
101001(2) = 0 101001 = 010010 + 1 = 010011(2)

d.) C2,7 (101111(2)) = X(2) 
101111(2) = 0 0101111 = 1011110 + 1 = 1011111(2)

e.) C2,8 (110100(2)) = X(2)
110100(2) = 0 00110100 = 01101000 + 1 = 01101001(2)
